mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_lake (observation_id, external_id, updated_at, loaded_at, provider, data, normalized, skipped) values (#{observationId}, #{externalId}, #{updatedAt}, #{loadedAt}, #{provider}, #{data}, #{normalized}, #{skipped})
UPDATE data_lake set normalized = 'true' where observation_id = #{observationId}
UPDATE data_lake set skipped = true where observation_id = #{observationId}
mapper.select: SELECT observation_id as observationId, external_id as externalId, updated_at as updatedAt, loaded_at as loadedAt, provider, data from data_lake where provider = #{provider} order by updated_at DESC limit 1

SELECT distinct on (e1.external_id) * from data_lake e1 where e1.provider = 'hpSrvSearch' and not exists( SELECT * from data_lake e2 where e1.external_id = e2.external_id and e2.provider = 'hpSrvMag' )

SELECT * from data_lake where provider = #{provider} and
#{externalId}

SELECT external_id from data_lake where provider = #{provider} and
#{externalId}

SELECT external_id, jsonb_object_field_text((data::jsonb)->'properties', 'geohash') as geohash from data_lake where provider = 'pdcMapSrv' and
#{externalId}
SELECT count(*) from data_lake where not normalized and not skipped;
